recommendations.title: Health & Performance Recommendations
recommendations.subtitle: Personalized recommendations based on your body composition, sport preferences, and fitness goals

saved.title: Saved Recommendations
saved.empty: You haven't saved any recommendations yet. Click the "Save" button on recommendations you want to reference later.

help.title: How to Use These Recommendations
help.description: These personalized recommendations are based on your current metrics and sport focus. Save your favorites, implement them consistently, and track your progress over time for best results.

allRecommendations.description: Browse all recommendations tailored to your profile and preferences.

recommendations.noResults: No recommendations found matching your criteria.

appearance.title: Appearance Settings
appearance.subtitle: Customize the look and feel of your site
appearance.note: Changes to appearance settings will be applied after saving and refreshing the page.

language.title: Language Settings
language.subtitle: Choose your preferred language
language.note: Changing language will reload the page.

api.title: API Integrations
api.subtitle: Configure external API connections
api.note: API keys are stored securely and used only for generating recommendations and responses.

content.title: Content Management
content.subtitle: Edit content displayed on the site

section1.title: Text Direction Test
section1.paragraph1: This paragraph tests how text flows in different languages. The text should flow from left to right in English and French, but from right to left in Arabic.
section1.paragraph2: Icons and elements should also adjust their positions based on the text direction. For example, this list:
section1.listItem1: First item with icon on the left (or right in RTL)

section2.title: Layout Direction Test

item1.title: Left/Right Positioning
item1.description: This circle should be on the left in LTR and right in RTL

section2.quote: This is a blockquote with a left border in LTR, which should become a right border in RTL.
